medical_history.chief_complaint: Severe orbital myiasis due to Cochliomyia hominivorax infestation.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Case 1: 15-day history of purulent secretions from left orbital area; underlying orbital mass present for 5 years. Case 2: 1-week history of swelling, erythema, and pain in left orbital area; prior ulcerative lesion for 15 years.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Case 1: 5-year history of underlying orbital mass; histopathological examination showed moderately differentiated squamous cell carcinoma. Case 2: 15-year history of underlying ulcerative skin lesion; histopathological analysis revealed ulcerated skin basocellular carcinoma.
medical_history.social_history: Both patients were single, worked in agriculture, and lived in low-resource areas. There is a mention of a history of alcohol use, social isolation, and poverty.
